resources.string: Hybrid strain created during the late 1970s. Diverse genetics: Afghani, Acapulco Gold and Colombian Gold.
Haze is a sativa strain originally from Santa Cruz, California. Powerful and sturdy plant, with a lengthy flowering period.

100% Natural and Organic. FoxFarm Ocean Forest Soil is ready to use right out of the bag and provides the ideal environment for young seedlings to become thriving plants. Lightweight and well-aerated, it’s the perfect all-natural mix for container grown plants!

Feith_Electric

Our reliable friend. An absolutely amazing solution for the ones who need no compromise.

Pro_Star_Dual

The future is here. Very low consumption, strong buff.

But don’t stare in it. It might leave a black spot in your eyesight for a while.

CFL_Grow

Our spiral-shape friend. Buying one is expensive,

but lasts long and won’t heat up our plants surrounding.

HPS_Grow

The well-known all-rounder. A basic component of

all semi-illegal garden. Eats a lot of watts while keeps

your tent warm. Times changing tough. Time to switch to LED.

Desk_Bulb

Every beginning is difficult. Low consumption pairs with low efficiency.

It’s good for a night-time read.

Sodium_1000

The good old lamp known from the PE classes.

Takes forever to fully heat it up, but once it’s on, it’s a beast.

Must be careful around them young plants.

Always have some ventilation on.

Volatile HPS

Heats up its environment but gives a heavy boost to the

plant beneath. Halts progress of younger plants.

Metal_Halide_Bulb

This bulb’s always a good choice, but there’s a

small chance of explosion.

Be care my friend. Always wear goggles.
